PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_CoveringFlooring
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties common to the definition of all occurrence and type objects of covering with the predefined type set to FLOORING.

PropertyDef.Name: HasNonSkidSurface
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether the surface finish is designed to prevent slippery (TRUE) or not (FALSE).

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: Angabe, ob der Bodenbelag eine nichtrutschende Oberfläche hat (JA), oder nicht (NEIN).
表示表面处理是否设计为防滑的。

PropertyDef.Name: HasAntiStaticSurface
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether the surface finish is designed to prevent electrostatic charge (TRUE) or not (FALSE).

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: Angabe, ob der Bodenbelag eine antistatische Oberfläche hat (JA), oder nicht (NEIN).
表示表面处理是否设计为防静电的。

PsetDefinitionAliases.PsetDefinitionAlias: 所有PredefinedType设置为FLOORING的IfcCovering实例的定义中通用的属性。
